rows: The unique ID of the previously trained model instance. Used to specify which model to apply for classification.

A dictionary that includes the input field values for classification.The key is the field name. It must match the name defined in theQuery metadata for selecting additional training data(MetaDatacode) field of theML model(MLModelcode) lookup.The value is the actual field value provided for prediction.
html:
modelInstanceUId

The unique ID of the previously trained model instance. Used to specify which model to apply for classification.

Dictionary<string, object> data

A dictionary that includes the input field values for classification.

The key is the field name. It must match the name defined in the Query metadata for selecting additional training data (MetaData code) field of the ML model (MLModel code) lookup.

The value is the actual field value provided for prediction.
